name: Legends Untamed: Reborn
description:
Step into the world of Gaia, where you can tame a variety of cute and powerful creatures! Join the Tamer Guild and unlock the legends that lie within!

Chaos is spreading through the lands of Gaia. Normally docile Gaiamon are going berserk and no one knows why! Only one thing is for sure though... only the Titan can save us! But there is one teensy problem... the Titan is deceased! 

 Catch cute beasties and use them to fight through powerful enemies!

Assemble the perfect team and battle your way  to revive the Legendary Titan! These are just some of the many creatures you can tame!

 So what are you waiting for?  The Guild awaits!
